pr_title: Push browser history state after postponed navigation proceeds

timeline.message:
* Push browser history state after navigation is certain because in case
of postpone the url in the address bar is changed too early and the
navigation process might not proceed
* Remove adding to history state from RouterLinkHandler as the
server-side does the same job at the correct time

Push the browser history state in ApplicationRunnerServlet.Router in
test-root-ui-context as it's not done in RouterLinkHandler anymore

timeline.bodyText: In InternalRedirectHandler there's a replaceState. I think that should be replaced by pushState as well.
timeline.author: bogdanudrescu

replies.bodyText: I don't know the exact purpose of replaceState there. But, router.navigate is called after that and it will lead to pushState. So, I think the replacement is not necessary.
replies.author: mehdi-vaadin

timeline.message:
